html: Over the next 5 years, #RaiseTheWage would incrementally raise the federal minimum up to $15. The steady increase is good for workers, good for business, and good for the economy. No American working full time should live in poverty.
text: Over the next 5 years, #RaiseTheWage would incrementally raise the federal minimum up to $15. The steady increase is good for workers, good for business, and good for the economy. No American working full time should live in poverty.

html: Proud to join my colleagues as co-sponsor of the #RaiseTheWage Act, reintroduced for the 116th Congress today in the House. html: I signed the CRA discharge petition because I believe that consumers, not ISPs, should have control over their access to the internet. Without #NetNeutrality rules, ISPs can raise prices or force users into slow lanes. #NetNeutrality was working, and it’s time to restore it.pic.twitter.com/ecIPuDKiw4
text: I signed the CRA discharge petition because I believe that consumers, not ISPs, should have control over their access to the internet. Without #NetNeutrality rules, ISPs can raise prices or force users into slow lanes. #NetNeutrality was working, and it’s time to restore it.pic.twitter.com/ecIPuDKiw4

html: With fluctuating energy costs and an increased focus on lowering carbon emissions, this compost aeration and heat recovery system pilot project is helping pave the way for dairy farm modernization and efficiency in #Connecticut.
text: With fluctuating energy costs and an increased focus on lowering carbon emissions, this compost aeration and heat recovery system pilot project is helping pave the way for dairy farm modernization and efficiency in #Connecticut.

html: This project is demonstrating an alternative to costlier energy installations at other farms in the region. Not only is this system generating energy that the farm uses for heated air and water , but it is also producing value-added compost faster than a traditional system.pic.twitter.com/mszOTKDKnm
text: This project is demonstrating an alternative to costlier energy installations at other farms in the region. Not only is this system generating energy that the farm uses for heated air and water , but it is also producing value-added compost faster than a traditional system.pic.twitter.com/mszOTKDKnm

html: With the help of about $60,000 of state and federal investment, the farm was able to install a compost aeration and heat recovery system, which is the first of its kind in #Connecticut. The project was supported by the U.S. Department of Energy State Energy Program (SEP).pic.twitter.com/zll7pxRExr
text: With the help of about $60,000 of state and federal investment, the farm was able to install a compost aeration and heat recovery system, which is the first of its kind in #Connecticut. The project was supported by the U.S. Department of Energy State Energy Program (SEP).pic.twitter.com/zll7pxRExr

 running.

html: At @QVCC, Justin studied manufacturing technologies, graduating after only three semesters and garnering himself an internship at Micro-Precision. html: It has been standard procedure for decades to refer any new allegations made against a Supreme Court nominee to the FBI for review. The refusal to request such a review in this instance is completely unprecedented.

html: CT is home to 91 programs subject to the Gainful Employment Rule, serving over 18,000 students. Of these 91 programs, 17 are considered failing or risky because of their tendency to overload students with unmanageable debt levels relative to their earnings.
text: CT is home to 91 programs subject to the Gainful Employment Rule, serving over 18,000 students. Of these 91 programs, 17 are considered failing or risky because of their tendency to overload students with unmanageable debt levels relative to their earnings.

html: The Gainful Employment Rule requires colleges to report how successful their graduates are at obtaining a job in the student’s field of study. By this metric, colleges are graded on how well they are preparing students to enter the workforce.

html: Forcing our military to choose to use or not to use their family benefits in a timed countdown fashion is unjust and it should be their right to use those benefits however and whenever they see fit.
text: Forcing our military to choose to use or not to use their family benefits in a timed countdown fashion is unjust and it should be their right to use those benefits however and whenever they see fit.

html: This order undermines the spirit of the Post-9/11 GI Bill and is a slap in the face to those who have dedicated years to serving our country. I organized 83 of my colleagues in the House and sent a letter to Secretary of Defense Jim Mattis to oppose this change in the GI Bill.
text: This order undermines the spirit of the Post-9/11 GI Bill and is a slap in the face to those who have dedicated years to serving our country. I organized 83 of my colleagues in the House and sent a letter to Secretary of Defense Jim Mattis to oppose this change in the GI Bill.

html: The system in place now requires vets to demonstrate that symptoms of certain diseases developed within a year of exposure to receive care and compensation. The Agent Orange Exposure Fairness Act eliminates these excessive and unfair requirements.
text: The system in place now requires vets to demonstrate that symptoms of certain diseases developed within a year of exposure to receive care and compensation. The Agent Orange Exposure Fairness Act eliminates these excessive and unfair requirements.

text: Santi is an American citizen, and he is a child whose health requires the support of his family. His story sheds a light on the human lives at stake on the other end of this administration’s hard-line immigration policies. @connecticutchildrens @IndivisibleCo

html: Now, Julian Rodriguez faces threat of deportation. Santi requires lifelong care that is highly inaccessible and unaffordable in Colombia, and it is absolutely critical that Santi have the support of his family as he continues his road towards a healthier future.
text: Now, Julian Rodriguez faces threat of deportation. Santi requires lifelong care that is highly inaccessible and unaffordable in Colombia, and it is absolutely critical that Santi have the support of his family as he continues his road towards a healthier future.

html: Santi’s parents fled to the US from Colombia in 2000, petitioning for asylum in 2002. After being denied asylum, and after filing subsequent appeals that were ultimately denied, Santi’s parents have regularly appeared for mandated check-ins over the past 9 years.
text: Santi’s parents fled to the US from Colombia in 2000, petitioning for asylum in 2002. After being denied asylum, and after filing subsequent appeals that were ultimately denied, Santi’s parents have regularly appeared for mandated check-ins over the past 9 years.

html: That time restriction alone blocks many who suffer from AO from receiving coverage. Some dont see symptoms for years after exposure. My bill, the AO Exposure Fairness Act, cuts the time restrictions for symptom reporting. I applaud Gerry and other vets for fighting for their own.
text: That time restriction alone blocks many who suffer from AO from receiving coverage. Some dont see symptoms for years after exposure. My bill, the AO Exposure Fairness Act, cuts the time restrictions for symptom reporting. I applaud Gerry and other vets for fighting for their own.

html: Regulations governing who can obtain coverage for #AgentOrange exposure are insufficient in granting vets the coverage they need. The law allows medical coverage for only 2 diseases due to AO and restricts reporting of symptoms to 1 year after a vet's last service date.
text: Regulations governing who can obtain coverage for #AgentOrange exposure are insufficient in granting vets the coverage they need. The law allows medical coverage for only 2 diseases due to AO and restricts reporting of symptoms to 1 year after a vet's last service date.

html: With new #Medicare cards being delivered in CT, be advised that if you receive calls from someone claiming to be Medicare asking for your personal info for a “new card”—it's a scam! Cards can take at least a month to arrive, but Medicare will NEVER call asking for info or money.
text: With new #Medicare cards being delivered in CT, be advised that if you receive calls from someone claiming to be Medicare asking for your personal info for a “new card”—it's a scam! Cards can take at least a month to arrive, but Medicare will NEVER call asking for info or money.
